prodNameC: 生物梅里埃退伍軍人桿菌分離培養基
ingredientsDesc:
Theoretical formula	
Yeast extract	10 g
Activated charcoal 	2 g
ACES/KOH buffer (pH adjustment)	12.8 g
ΑKetoglutarate	1 g
Agar	16 g
L. cysteine hydrochloride 	0.4 g
Ferric pyrophosphate 	0.25 g
Glycine without ammonium 	3 g
Polymyxin B sulfate 	80000 Ul
Vancomycin 	0.001 g
Cycloheximide	0.08 g
Purified water 	1 l
applicantName: 香港商生物梅里埃有限公司台灣分公司
applicantAddr: 台北市松山區南京東路5段34號4樓
efficacy: 培養及鑑定退伍軍人菌屬。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: C 免疫學及微生物學用裝置
